It is suitably referenced, and all major points have appropriate inline citations. -->=no |B-Class-2<!-- B-Class-2. It contains appropriate supporting materials, such as an infobox, images, or diagrams. -->=yes |Biography-task-force=yes |WWI-task-force=yes |ANZSP-task-force=yes}} }} {{dyktalk|12 August|2015|entry= ... that '''[[Henry Dewar (rugby)|Henry Dewar]]''' joined the expedition to [[occupation of German Samoa|occupy German Samoa]] the day after playing in [[Wellington Rugby Football Union|Wellington]]'s [[Ranfurly Shield]] defence against [[Wairarapa Rugby Football Union|Wairarapa]]?|nompage=Template:Did you know nominations/Henry Dewar (rugby)}}
== Sources ==
Possibly useful sources: * [http://natlib.govt.nz/records/22421116] * [http://natlib.govt.nz/records/3598271] -- [[User:Shudde|<font color="Blue">Shudde</font>]] <sup>[[User talk:Shudde|<font color="Blue">talk</font>]]</sup> 11:04, 14 July 2015 (UTC)
:Thanks, {{U|Shudde}}. I'm finding [http://paperspast.natlib.govt.nz Papers Past], also part of the National Library of New Zealand, an excellent source for [[Albert Downing]]: as you'd expect, several articles also mention Dewar. [[User:FunkyCanute|FunkyCanute]] ([[User talk:FunkyCanute|talk]]) 11:19, 14 July 2015 (UTC) The search function on there is not perfect, so things can easily be missed. It makes it a hard slog sometimes, but there are hidden jems in there! More: * [http://paperspast.natlib.govt.nz/cgi-bin/paperspast?a=d&d=NZFL19080606.2.18.1.1] * [http://paperspast.natlib.govt.nz/cgi-bin/paperspast?a=d&d=TO19130823.1.13 Ranfurly Shield victory over Auckland 16 August 1913] * [http://paperspast.natlib.govt.nz/cgi-bin/paperspast?a=d&cl=search&d=NZFL19080905.2.18.1.1 Melrose's club championship 1908] - [[User:Shudde|<font color="Blue">Shudde</font>]] <sup>[[User talk:Shudde|<font color="Blue">talk</font>]]</sup> 11:28, 14 July 2015 (UTC) :These are great! Any idea what the reference to 'butter fat' is about, in the second picture? [[User:FunkyCanute|FunkyCanute]] ([[User talk:FunkyCanute|talk]]) 11:27, 16 July 2015 (UTC)
== Commons == * [[:File:1913 All Blacks team that toured California.jpg]] -- According to [http://www.aucklandcity.govt.nz/dbtw-wpd/HeritageImages/images/photos/AWNp/1913/AWNS_19130918_p050_i000_b.jpg] Dewar is in the third row second from the right. - [[User:Shudde|<font color="Blue">Shudde</font>]] <sup>[[User talk:Shudde|<font color="Blue">talk</font>]]</sup> 06:11, 15 July 2015 (UTC)
== Stratford ==
There seems to be some confusion... contrary to NZRU's article, it appears that Dewar moved to Stratford in 1913, having played for nearby Hawera from 1910. I could be mistaken.
For the move, see: *{{cite news|title=Football|url=http://paperspast.natlib.govt.nz/cgi-bin/paperspast?a=d&cl=search&d=TDN19130426.2.57.5&srpos=164&e=--1910--10-1914--10--161-byDA---0Dewar+rugby+taranaki-ARTICLE-|accessdate=16 July 2015|work=Taranaki Daily News|date=16 April 1913|page=7}} *{{cite news|title=Stratford News|url=http://paperspast.natlib.govt.nz/cgi-bin/paperspast?a=d&cl=search&d=TDN19130513.2.9&srpos=167&e=--1910--10-1914--10--161-byDA---0Dewar+rugby+taranaki-ARTICLE-|accessdate=16 July 2015|work=Taranaki Daily News|date=13 May 1913|page=3}} Previous articles show him playing for Hawera.
[[User:FunkyCanute|FunkyCanute]] ([[User talk:FunkyCanute|talk]]) 11:18, 16 July 2015 (UTC)
In Taranaki, it looks like he played for: # Hawera 1910-? (Now part of Southern RFC) # Star Club (of New Plymouth?) ?-1912/3 (Now part of Spotswood United RFC) # Stratford 1913-1914 (from which he was selected for NZ) [[User:FunkyCanute|FunkyCanute]] ([[User talk:FunkyCanute|talk]]) 18:30, 16 July 2015 (UTC)
*http://paperspast.natlib.govt.nz/cgi-bin/paperspast?a=d&cl=search&d=SUNCH19150906.2.5.3&srpos=31&e=-10-1914--10-1915--50--1-byDA---0Dewar+rugby-ARTICLE- *http://paperspast.natlib.govt.nz/cgi-bin/paperspast?a=d&cl=search&d=TDN19150904.2.39&srpos=29&e=-10-1914--10-1915--50--1-byDA---0Dewar+rugby-ARTICLE- *http://paperspast.natlib.govt.nz/cgi-bin/paperspast?a=d&cl=search&d=NZFL19150903.2.41&srpos=27&e=-10-1914--10-1915--50--1-byDA---0Dewar+rugby-ARTICLE- [[User:FunkyCanute|FunkyCanute]] ([[User talk:FunkyCanute|talk]]) 20:23, 16 July 2015 (UTC)
== Shield defence ==
I've uncovered plenty of contemporaneous articles dealing with these games. I'll flesh out the final sentence in Rugby career into a proper paragraph. [[User:FunkyCanute|FunkyCanute]] ([[User talk:FunkyCanute|talk]]) 11:20, 16 July 2015 (UTC)
{{Did you know nominations/Henry Dewar (rugby)}}
== Flags in infobox ==
As per [[MOS:INFOBOXFLAG]] we should avoid the use of flags in the infobox. So I removed the flag next to the New Zealand flag. -- [[User:Shudde|<font color="Blue">Shudde</font>]] <sup>[[User talk:Shudde|<font color="Blue">talk</font>]]</sup> 09:11, 22 July 2015 (UTC)
